title: Short title
context: ARTICLE I [OLD] GENERAL PROVISIONS, DEFINITIONS AND PROBATE JURISDICTION OF COURT §§560:1-101 to 560:1-403 REPEALED. L 1996, c 288, pt of §6.560:8-201. PART 1. SHORT TITLE, CONSTRUCTION, GENERAL PROVISIONS §560:1-101 Short title. This chapter shall be known and may be cited as the Uniform Probate Code. [L 1996, c 288, pt of §1]
